description: Versatile and comfortable jacket, made in durable G-1000 Lite Eco with G-1000 Eco reinforcements – Övik Stencollar Jacket M is a practical jacket for outdoor adventures, as well as everyday urban life. It has a two-way front zipper with inside placket, two hand pockets and one chest pocket, all zippered. Articulated sleeves with buttoned cuffs and drawcord at the hem.
name: Fjallraven Ovik Stencollar Jacket - Mens
